title: Pro Bike Check: Isla Short’s Orbea Oiz World Cup XC Race Bike w/ prototype Hunt wheels
content:
We recently caught up with Orbea Factory Racing’s World Cup XCO athlete, Isla Short. The young Scottish athlete put in a belter of a performance at the 2020 World Championships in Leogang, placing 5th in some seriously muddy conditions that she is all too familiar with. Isla is looking to build on that this year, […]

The post Pro Bike Check: Isla Short’s Orbea Oiz World Cup XC Race Bike w/ prototype Hunt wheels appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
